title: Classic Midi Wrap Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a midi-length wrap dress, solid dusty rose color, lightweight crepe fabric, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, self-tie waist belt, subtle topstitching, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Midi-length wrap dress with short flutter sleeves and V-neckline. Constructed in lightweight crepe polyester blend. Features self-tie waist belt, hidden side zipper, and topstitching along neckline and hem. Skirt length from waist to hem: approx. 80cm.
provenance: Inspired by commercial midi-length trend for Spring/Summer 2024.
design_text:
Classic Midi Wrap Dress (MID2024-001)
Colors: Dusty Rose, Soft Blush, Warm Taupe
Fabrics: Lightweight Crepe, Polyester Blend
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: Dress
Silhouette: Wrap
Sleeves: Short Flutter Sleeves
Neckline: V-Neck
Length: Midi
Style / Fit: R, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , F, i, t
Trims & details: Self-tie waist belt, Topstitching along edges, Hidden side zipper
Techpack: available
